meanings.definition: A bacterial infection similar to typhoid fever.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with paratyphoid after running some tests.
meanings.sent2: The outbreak of paratyphoid in the community caused concern among the residents.
meanings.sent3: The paratyphoid bacteria decided to throw a party in the stomach, but nobody showed up.
meanings.sent4: The paratyphoid infection spread through the town like wildfire, affecting many people.
meanings.sent5: The symptoms of paratyphoid include fever, abdominal pain, and weakness.

meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by the bacterium Salmonella paratyphi.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to treat the paratyphoid infection.
meanings.sent2: The paratyphoid outbreak was traced back to contaminated food at the local market.
meanings.sent3: The paratyphoid bacteria threw a parade to celebrate their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: The paratyphoid strain was as stubborn as a mule, resisting all attempts to eradicate it.
meanings.sent5: The paratyphoid bacteria clung to the intestines like a determined hitchhiker.
